describe: Russia, the largest country in the world, spans Eastern Europe and northern Asia. It is known for its rich cultural heritage, diverse landscapes, and historical significance. From the bustling streets of Moscow to the serene beauty of Lake Baikal, Russia offers a wide array of experiences.
